column1: The Pit Room////Texas BBQ at it's finest. You can tell the second you drive up... stacks and stacks of seasoned firewood out front
column2: pits along the side of the building
column3: porch along the front of the building
column4: scarce parking because it's all taken up by the customers standing in line. The line never ends even so the service is fast
column5: but folks just keep coming and coming and once you eat here
